name: Target Number (BdR Games)
description:
The numbers game from the Countdown tv quiz. A game I made a couple of years ago but never finished. I still like the idea and want to either finish it or rebuild it into a proper game soon.

  • Each round you get 6 blue tiles with random numbers and a target number
  • Add, subtract, multiply or divide the blue numbers
  • Try to reach the target number (or as close as possible)
  • You can use the resulting in-between numbers as well
  • Negative numbers or fractions (non-integers) are not allowed.
  • Press the yellow "<" to undo (no undo limit)

It is a prototype and the built-in puzzle solver works very well, but the graphics, scoring, tutorial and "general" flow of the game is not polished at all.
